rows.label: tlk70000060_04_msg0001
rows.name:
I thought I'd stick around the capital
a while longer, but that means I really
need to find a job...

rows.label: tlk70000060_04_msg0002
rows.name:
I should steer clear of the protection
and subjugation stuff. So that leaves
gathering missions aaand, lessee...

rows.label: tlk70000060_04_msg0003
rows.name:
Making tasty meals for people!
I'll be able to cheer Dad up that
way for sure!

rows.label: tlk70000060_04_msg0004
rows.name:
Oh, and I really should pay Dio-san a visit
to tell him I'm back safe and sound!
